productName: Ceiling Mounted Cassette Round Flow & Round Flow with Sensing (Optional)
shortDes: A ceiling-recessed unit providing 360-degree airflow, ideal for open commercial spaces. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: 360° round air distribution.
Intelligent sensing for occupancy, floor temperature, and humidity (on select models).
Individual flap control with up to 18 distinct airflow patterns.
Inverter DC fan motor.
Silver ion-treated drain pan.
capabilities: Ultra-quiet operation (down to 27 dB(A)).
High SEER ratings (up to 21).
Optional auto self-cleaning filter panel.
Supports flexible 2-way, 3-way, and 4-way flow configurations.

coreFeatures: Round design with 6-step crystal vanes for 360° airflow.
Full-3D fan for powerful air circulation.
Gyro-sensor based human detection (on select models).
Low-profile unit height (330 mm).
Inverter scroll compressor with R-32 refrigerant.
capabilities: Quiet operation (down to 39 dB(A)).
Advertised up to 30% faster cooling.
Smart control via LG ThinQ® app.

shortDes: An ultra-thin, concealed unit for discreet ducted air conditioning in tight ceiling voids. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: Ultra-slim profile at 7-7/8″ (200 mm).
Selectable external static pressure (low/med/high).
Rear or bottom suction configuration.
Includes a washable filter and a built-in condensate pump.
capabilities: Ultra-quiet operation (down to 29 dB(A)).
Compatible with VRV and VRV-S systems.
Inverter compressor using R-410A refrigerant.

coreFeatures: Low-profile (270 mm height) ceiling-concealed design.
BLDC fan motor with External Static Pressure (ESP) control.
Selectable rear or bottom air intake.
Two-thermistor control (at unit and remote).
capabilities: Low noise operation.
Supports group control of multiple units.

shortDes: A specialized ceiling-recessed unit with two-directional airflow for corridors and long rooms. This is a specialized Daikin product.

coreFeatures: Two-way airflow for long, narrow spaces.
Slim design (305 mm height).
Individual louver control.
High-lift drain pump included as standard.
capabilities: Long-life filter included as standard accessory.

shortDes: A powerful, concealed unit with high static pressure for extensive ductwork in large zones. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: High External Static Pressure (up to 200 Pa).
DC fan motor.
Flexible bottom or rear suction design.
Standard built-in high-lift drain pump.
capabilities: High airflow and cooling capacities.
Supports Building Management System (BMS) integration.

coreFeatures: High External Static Pressure (ESP) capability.
Inverter compressor.
Spiral duct design for reduced noise.
capabilities: Wide operating temperature range.
Optional Wi-Fi control.

shortDes: An indoor unit that mounts under the ceiling, ideal for spaces without ceiling voids like retail stores. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: Wide air discharge opening with automatic swing function.
Anti-mould and anti-bacterial treated air filter.
Slim design for installation on exposed ceilings.
capabilities: Suitable for spaces with high ceilings or no ceiling voids.

coreFeatures: Powerful airflow with long reach (up to 15m).
Jet Cool function for rapid cooling.
Vertical and horizontal auto-swing.
capabilities: Supports long piping lengths.

shortDes: A common ductless indoor unit mounted high on a wall for residential or small office use. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: Stylish, flat panel design.
Coanda airflow technology for draft-free cooling.
Intelligent Eye sensor (on select models).
Titanium apatite deodorizing filter.
capabilities: Ultra-quiet operation.
Energy savings via sensor.

coreFeatures: Dual Inverter Compressor.
Built-in Wi-Fi for LG ThinQ® app control.
Active Energy Control function.
4-Way Auto Swing.
capabilities: Advertised faster cooling.
Plasmaster™ Ionizer+ for air purification (select models).

shortDes: A large, customizable system for conditioning and circulating air in commercial buildings. This is a core commercial product for Daikin.

coreFeatures: Modular design for customization.
Thermal-break frames and insulated panels.
Accommodates multiple filter types (HEPA, bag filters).
Offers components like heat recovery wheels, coils, and humidifiers.
capabilities: High energy efficiency and prevention of condensation.
Supports integration with Building Management Systems (BMS).

shortDes: A powerful, vertical indoor unit that stands on the floor, ideal for large rooms with limited wall space. Verifiable products exist from Daikin and LG.

coreFeatures: Powerful vertical auto-swing.
Titanium apatite photocatalytic air-purifying filter.
Dual-position installation (floor or low-wall).
capabilities: High airflow rates for large spaces.

coreFeatures: Powerful, 4-way airflow.
Dual Inverter Compressor technology.
Auto-cleaning function.
capabilities: Advertised up to 40% faster cooling.
Slim tower design.
Smart control with built-in Wi-Fi and LG ThinQ® app.

shortDes: A Variable Refrigerant Volume (VRV) system for commercial use, connecting multiple indoor units to a single, highly efficient outdoor unit.

coreFeatures: Variable Refrigerant Temperature (VRT) technology automatically adjusts refrigerant temperature to load.
Large capacity single outdoor units and modules.
Hot gas bypass circuit for continuous heating, even during the defrost cycle.
Advanced inverter compressor with a multi-port refrigerant distribution system.
capabilities: Connects up to 64 indoor units to a single system.
Total piping length of up to 3,280 ft (1,000 m).
High Integrated Energy Efficiency Ratio (IEER) values.
Wide operating temperature range for extreme climates.
Advanced system management via Daikin's Intelligent Touch Manager (iTM).

shortDes: A Variable Refrigerant Flow (VRF) system, LG's direct equivalent to VRV, providing zoned climate control for commercial buildings.

coreFeatures: Ultimate Inverter Compressor with a wide operational range (10-165Hz).
Dual Sensing Control that senses both temperature and humidity.
Continuous Heating technology with split coil defrost.
Ocean Black Fin coating for enhanced corrosion resistance.
Smart Oil Management system using a sensor for efficient oil return.
capabilities: Connects up to 64 indoor units.
High efficiency ratings certified by AHRI 1230.
Dynamic Defrost technology to minimize defrost cycles.
Advanced system control with LG MV (Multi V) solutions.
Large capacity modules up to 22 tons.

shortDes: A large-tonnage system that chills water using screw compressors, designed for major commercial and industrial applications.

coreFeatures: High-efficiency vertical rotary screw compressors.
Flooded type evaporator for superior heat transfer efficiency.
V-coil condenser design for a smaller physical footprint.
Advanced microprocessor controller (Vision 2020i).
Electronic expansion valve for precise refrigerant control.
capabilities: Wide capacity range from 80 to over 500 tons of refrigeration.
High Integrated Part Load Value (IPLV) ratings.
Supports R-134a refrigerant.
Low-noise fan options for sound-sensitive applications.
Full compatibility with BMS protocols (Modbus, BACnet, LonWorks).
